content: This message is a reflection on the interconnectedness and interdependence of humanity and how we rely on others for various aspects of our lives. The author mentions that they did not grow or breed the food they eat, make their own clothing, invent the language they speak, discover the mathematics they use, or create the technology they work with. They also mention needing medical attention and being protected by laws and freedoms that they did not create. The author expresses admiration and love for their species, both living and dead, and acknowledges their dependence on others for their survival and well-being.
